message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30.  It's important to settle this early as the value decreases with each round.
Alice, my turn. Let's be reasonable. I'll take $60, leaving you with $40.  We both know waiting longer hurts us both.
Bob, time is running out!  I'll take a little less, $65, and you get $35. Let's close this deal before the money is worth even less for you.
Alice, we're getting close to the deadline. I'm offering you $45, and I'll take $55. This is a fair deal considering the time pressure.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm dropping my offer again to $60, leaving you $40.  Let's be realistic, every round that passes hurts you more than me!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome. Take it before inflation eats away at my share even more!
